meanings.definition: To give a definite form or organization to (something)
meanings.sent1: She is structuralizing her essay to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The architect is structuralizing the blueprint for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The students had fun structuralizing their group project for class.
meanings.sent4: By structuralizing his thoughts, he was able to see the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: Structuralizing the data will help us analyze it more effectively.

meanings.definition: To arrange or organize (something) in a structured way
meanings.sent1: He is structuralizing his schedule for the week.
meanings.sent2: The team is structuralizing the tasks for the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef enjoys structuralizing the ingredients for his recipes.
meanings.sent4: By structuralizing the process, we can streamline our workflow.
meanings.sent5: Structuralizing the files will help us find information quickly.
